alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS AND SOUTHWESTERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Island Lake, to 7 miles north of Brookston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Island Lake and Boulder Lake around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Saginaw, Larsmont and Pike Lake Near Duluth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
